Title: Relates to the purchase of firearms and firearm ammunition with a credit card
Summary: Requires credit card, debit card, or processor service companies to allow for the purchase of firearms and firearm ammunition with such services.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the purchase of firearms and firearm ammunition with a credit card or debit card
